Name: Empty/Air
Description: Nothing, these tiles are not rendered and have no collision, making up the empty space of levels.

Name: Solid
Description: These tiles make up the basis of most levels. The player and other entities collide with these tiles and cannot pass through them.

Name: Large Spike (Right)
Description: This tile kills the player on contact, the direction is simply cosmetic.

Name: Large Spike (Down)
Description: This tile kills the player on contact, the direction is simply cosmetic.
